article_node.title: Jobless claims rise and private employers slow down hiring in August
article_node.summary: Jobless claims rose and private hiring slowed, signalling a softening labor market. Trump’s tariffs and immigration crackdown are blamed for the hiring slowdown. The Fed may resume rate cuts later this month, pending August employment data and inflation.
